verses.name: Isaiah 38:11
verses.text: I said, I shall not see the Lord, even the Lord, in the land of the living: I shall behold man no more with the inhabitants of the world.

verses.name: Isaiah 38:12
verses.text: Mine age is departed, and is removed from me as a shepherd’s tent: I have cut off like a weaver my life: he will cut me off with pining sickness: from day even to night wilt thou make an end of me.

verses.name: Isaiah 38:13
verses.text: I reckoned till morning, that, as a lion, so will he break all my bones: from day even to night wilt thou make an end of me.
